q_en: Which cutting tasks use Cotton Fabric?
gt:
Sure thing! Here are the cutting tasks that use "Cotton Fabric" as a material. I've organized the details into a table for you. üòä

| Cutting Task ID | Start Time      | End Time        | Working Group ID | Order Product ID | Produced WIP ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status     |
|-----------------|-----------------|-----------------|------------------|------------------|-----------------|----------------|------------------|------------|
| 1               | January 10, 2024| January 18, 2024| 2                | 1                | 2               | 100            | 100              | Completed  |
| 2               | January 10, 2024| February 2, 2024| 3                | 2                | 10              | 240            | 240              | In Progress|
| 3               | January 10, 2024| January 19, 2024| 3                | 3                | 2               | 150            | 150              | Completed  |
| 4               | January 10, 2024| January 17, 2024| 2                | 4                | 4               | 220            | 220              | In Progress|
| 5               | January 10, 2024| February 2, 2024| 2                | 5                | 8               | 260            | 260              | In Progress|
| 19              | March 18, 2024  | April 12, 2024  | 4                | 19               | 6               | 95             | 95               | In Progress|
| 21              | March 18, 2024  | April 4, 2024   | 4                | 21               | 10              | 85             | 85               | In Progress|
| 28              | April 19, 2024  | May 12, 2024    | 2                | 28               | 4               | 210            | 210              | In Progress|

These tasks are all about using "Cotton Fabric" to create amazing products! üßµ‚ú® If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Cotton Fabric';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT wip_id FROM wip_material WHERE origin_material_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the WIP material IDs that use the original material "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE produced_wip_id IN ('10', '12', '2', '6');
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that produce the WIP materials obtained in Step2

results.input:
Retrieve the details of the cutting tasks obtained in Step3
["tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 1}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 2}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 3}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 6}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 7}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 8}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 9}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 12}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 13}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 14}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 15}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 18}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 19}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 20}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 21}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 22}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 25}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 29}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 30}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 33}, Find the cutting task details", "tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': 34}, Find the cutting task details"]
